name: aftermath
effect: When this Pok√©mon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: Damages the foe landing the finishing hit.
